entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.18.4
entry.content: This is a release made to publish a build on GitHub. No changes in the code.

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.19.0
entry.content:
This release includes bug fixes to improve Daguâ€™s robustness.

As a new feature, you can now specify a container at the DAG level to run all steps in a single container with a shared volume. Private registries are also supported. This makes it easier to create reproducible workflows using container images. Please visit the container config doc for more details.

What's Changed

  • fix: prevent exit code 0 from incorrectly triggering continuation for skipped steps by @thefishhat in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1158
  • feat: DAG level container field to run steps in a single container by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1154
  • feat: add zombie DAG run detection to scheduler by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1163
  • feat: add container registry authentication support by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1165
  • Fix scheduler to check if DAG is running by heartbeat instead of status file by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1166
  • Fix stop operation to handle case where RunID is not specified by @yottahmd in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/1167

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.18.4...v1.19.0
